verbose_text: NS5 downregulated Ca 2+ -binding chaperone calreticulin, confirmed by Western blot and quantitative real-time PCR, as correlating with increased release of Ca 2+ from ER into cytosol, as well as gene silencing of calreticulin raising intracellular Ca 2+ levels in controls.
evidence: release of Ca 2+  from ER into cytosol
